channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 15:29 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack
item.description: 🟠 15:29 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
